name: Keith 3D (In Progress)
description: Looking to relive the good ol' days of early 2000s 3D-platformers? That's the goal with this upcoming Keith game! Explore levels, overcome platforming challenges, and collect plenty of items. This game features bright colors, a tropical theme at its core with lots of twists and turns, memorable music, and characters filled with charm. It's still very much in development, but a demo of the current state of the project is available for you to play. Feel free to leave any feedback you have! Donations are greatly appreciated, as they help me put more focus into the game.
